rules.natural: Provided that a security officer is on senior officer duty, then if it is not the case that whenever a security officer is present, a passenger at the checkpoint shows identification, the security officer requests authorization from a supervisor.

Whenever a security officer is on junior officer duty, then if it is not the case that under the condition that a security officer is present, a passenger at the checkpoint shows identification, the security officer requests authorization from a supervisor.
Provided that a security officer is on day shift, then the security officer is on senior officer duty.
Either a security officer is on day shift or a security officer is on night shift.
If a security officer is on night shift, then the security officer is on junior officer duty.
Provided that a vehicle inspection is required, then security clearance is granted to a passenger.
If alcohol is detected in a vehicle, then it is not the case that the vehicle is cleared.
Under the condition that a suspicious package is in a vehicle, the vehicle is not cleared.
Either a passenger has valid identification or the passenger is not allowed to board the flight.
Either boarding is announced for a flight or the gate is opened for a flight.
Whenever the gate is opened for a flight, then passenger boarding is occurring for the flight or security clearance is granted to a passenger.
Provided that boarding has started for a flight, then either passenger boarding is occurring for the flight or security clearance is granted to a passenger.

If a security breach is detected by the security system, then whenever it is not the case that provided boarding is announced for a flight, boarding has started for the flight, boarding is not delayed for the flight.
Under the condition that a passenger passed the security check, the passenger has no restricted items.
Either a passenger passed the security check or the passenger does not have valid identification.
If an alert is triggered by the security system, then a security breach is detected by the security system.
Provided that the security system is activated, an alert is triggered by the security system.
Whenever there is unauthorized access to an area, then if security clearance is not granted to a passenger, the terminal is not under emergency lockdown.
Either there is unauthorized access to an area or suspicious activity is detected in an area.

If security protocol is activated by the security system, then whenever suspicious activity is detected in an area, provided security clearance is not granted to a passenger, the terminal is not under emergency lockdown.
Provided that a false alarm is triggered by the security system, the warning light is on for the security system.
If a false alarm is triggered by the security system, then it is not the case that the alarm is sounding on the security system.
Either a false alarm is triggered by the security system or the terminal is not under normal operations.
Whenever the warning light is on for the security system, the alarm is sounding on the security system.
Provided that a passenger has no restricted items, the passenger is cleared for boarding.
If a passenger shows a ticket, then security clearance is granted to the passenger.
Under the condition that a passenger shows identification, security clearance is granted to the passenger.
Provided that a passenger entered the security area, the passenger shows a ticket.
Either a passenger entered the security area or a passenger is at the checkpoint.

Under the condition that it is not the case that if a security officer is present, then a passenger at the checkpoint shows identification, the security officer does not request authorization from a supervisor.
If it is not the case that provided a supervisor is notified by a security officer, the security officer escalates to a supervisor, then a vehicle inspection is completed.
Under the condition that it is not the case that whenever a supervisor is notified by a security officer, the security officer escalates to a supervisor, a vehicle inspection is not completed.
Provided that it is not the case that if boarding is announced for a flight, boarding has started for the flight, boarding is delayed for the flight.

Provided that it is not the case that under the condition that it is not the case that either alcohol is detected in a vehicle or a suspicious package is in a vehicle, a routine inspection occurs on the vehicle, a supervisor is notified by the security officer.

If it is not the case that provided it is not the case that either alcohol is detected in a vehicle or a suspicious package is in a vehicle, a routine inspection occurs on the vehicle, the security officer does not escalate to a supervisor.
Provided that a vehicle inspection is not required, the vehicle is cleared.
If security protocol is not activated by the security system, then the terminal is under normal operations.
Under the condition that security clearance is not granted to a passenger, the passenger is allowed to board the flight.
Provided that security clearance is not granted to a passenger, the terminal is under emergency lockdown.

facts.natural: A routine inspection does not occur on a vehicle.
Passenger boarding is not occurring for a flight.
A passenger is not cleared for boarding.

target.natural: Security clearance is granted to a passenger.

(A10 → (A9 → A7)).natural: If a security officer is present, then provided that a passenger is at the checkpoint, the passenger shows identification.

(A12 → (¬(A10 → (A9 → A7)) → A11)).natural: Provided that a security officer is on senior officer duty, then if it is not the case that whenever a security officer is present, a passenger at the checkpoint shows identification, the security officer requests authorization from a supervisor.

(A12 ∨ A13).natural: Either a security officer is on senior officer duty or a security officer is on junior officer duty.

(A13 → (¬(A10 → (A9 → A7)) → A11)).natural: Whenever a security officer is on junior officer duty, then if it is not the case that under the condition that a security officer is present, a passenger at the checkpoint shows identification, the security officer requests authorization from a supervisor.

(A14 → A12).natural: Provided that a security officer is on day shift, then the security officer is on senior officer duty.

(A14 ∨ A15).natural: Either a security officer is on day shift or a security officer is on night shift.

(A15 → A13).natural: If a security officer is on night shift, then the security officer is on junior officer duty.

(A16 → G).natural: Provided that a vehicle inspection is required, then security clearance is granted to a passenger.

(A18 → ¬A17).natural: If alcohol is detected in a vehicle, then it is not the case that the vehicle is cleared.

(A18 ∨ A19).natural: Either alcohol is detected in a vehicle or a suspicious package is in a vehicle.

(A19 → ¬A17).natural: Under the condition that a suspicious package is in a vehicle, the vehicle is not cleared.

(A2 ∨ ¬A1).natural: Either a passenger has valid identification or the passenger is not allowed to board the flight.

(A22 → A21).natural: Provided that a supervisor is notified by a security officer, the security officer escalates to a supervisor.

(A24 ∨ G).natural: Either passenger boarding is occurring for a flight or security clearance is granted to a passenger.

(A25 → (A24 ∨ G)).natural: If boarding is announced for a flight, then either passenger boarding is occurring for the flight or security clearance is granted to a passenger.

(A25 → A27).natural: Under the condition that boarding is announced for a flight, boarding has started for the flight.

(A25 ∨ A26).natural: Either boarding is announced for a flight or the gate is opened for a flight.

(A26 → (A24 ∨ G)).natural: Whenever the gate is opened for a flight, then passenger boarding is occurring for the flight or security clearance is granted to a passenger.

(A27 → (A24 ∨ G)).natural: Provided that boarding has started for a flight, then either passenger boarding is occurring for the flight or security clearance is granted to a passenger.

(A29 → (¬(A25 → A27) → ¬A28)).natural: If a security breach is detected by the security system, then whenever it is not the case that provided boarding is announced for a flight, boarding has started for the flight, boarding is not delayed for the flight.

(A3 → A4).natural: Provided that a passenger passed the security check, then the passenger is cleared for boarding.

(A3 → A5).natural: Under the condition that a passenger passed the security check, the passenger has no restricted items.

(A3 ∨ ¬A2).natural: Either a passenger passed the security check or the passenger does not have valid identification.

(A30 → A29).natural: If an alert is triggered by the security system, then a security breach is detected by the security system.

(A31 → A30).natural: Provided that the security system is activated, an alert is triggered by the security system.

(A33 → (¬G → ¬A32)).natural: Whenever there is unauthorized access to an area, then if security clearance is not granted to a passenger, the terminal is not under emergency lockdown.

(A33 ∨ A34).natural: Either there is unauthorized access to an area or suspicious activity is detected in an area.

(A34 → (¬G → ¬A32)).natural: Provided that suspicious activity is detected in an area, then under the condition that security clearance is not granted to a passenger, the terminal is not under emergency lockdown.

(A35 → (A34 → (¬G → ¬A32))).natural: If security protocol is activated by the security system, then whenever suspicious activity is detected in an area, provided security clearance is not granted to a passenger, the terminal is not under emergency lockdown.

(A37 → A38).natural: Under the condition that a false alarm is triggered by the security system, the alarm is sounding on the security system.

(A37 → A39).natural: Provided that a false alarm is triggered by the security system, the warning light is on for the security system.

(A37 → ¬A38).natural: If a false alarm is triggered by the security system, then it is not the case that the alarm is sounding on the security system.

(A37 ∨ ¬A36).natural: Either a false alarm is triggered by the security system or the terminal is not under normal operations.

(A39 → A38).natural: Whenever the warning light is on for the security system, the alarm is sounding on the security system.

(A5 → A4).natural: Provided that a passenger has no restricted items, the passenger is cleared for boarding.

(A6 → G).natural: If a passenger shows a ticket, then security clearance is granted to the passenger.

(A6 ∨ A7).natural: Either a passenger shows a ticket or a passenger shows identification.

(A7 → G).natural: Under the condition that a passenger shows identification, security clearance is granted to the passenger.

(A8 → A6).natural: Provided that a passenger entered the security area, the passenger shows a ticket.

(A8 ∨ A9).natural: Either a passenger entered the security area or a passenger is at the checkpoint.

(A9 → A7).natural: If a passenger is at the checkpoint, then the passenger shows identification.

(¬(A10 → (A9 → A7)) → A11).natural: Whenever it is not the case that provided a security officer is present, a passenger at the checkpoint shows identification, the security officer requests authorization from a supervisor.

(¬(A10 → (A9 → A7)) → ¬A11).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that if a security officer is present, then a passenger at the checkpoint shows identification, the security officer does not request authorization from a supervisor.

(¬(A18 ∨ A19) → A20).natural: Provided that it is not the case that either alcohol is detected in a vehicle or a suspicious package is in a vehicle, a routine inspection occurs on the vehicle.

(¬(A22 → A21) → A23).natural: If it is not the case that provided a supervisor is notified by a security officer, the security officer escalates to a supervisor, then a vehicle inspection is completed.

(¬(A22 → A21) → ¬A23).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that whenever a supervisor is notified by a security officer, the security officer escalates to a supervisor, a vehicle inspection is not completed.

(¬(A25 → A27) → A28).natural: Provided that it is not the case that if boarding is announced for a flight, boarding has started for the flight, boarding is delayed for the flight.

(¬(A25 → A27) → ¬A28).natural: Whenever it is not the case that under the condition that boarding is announced for a flight, boarding has started for the flight, boarding is not delayed for the flight.

(¬(¬(A18 ∨ A19) → A20) → A21).natural: If it is not the case that whenever it is not the case that either alcohol is detected in a vehicle or a suspicious package is in a vehicle, a routine inspection occurs on the vehicle, the security officer escalates to a supervisor.

(¬(¬(A18 ∨ A19) → A20) → A22).natural: Provided that it is not the case that under the condition that it is not the case that either alcohol is detected in a vehicle or a suspicious package is in a vehicle, a routine inspection occurs on the vehicle, a supervisor is notified by the security officer.

(¬(¬(A18 ∨ A19) → A20) → ¬A21).natural: If it is not the case that provided it is not the case that either alcohol is detected in a vehicle or a suspicious package is in a vehicle, a routine inspection occurs on the vehicle, the security officer does not escalate to a supervisor.

(¬A16 → A17).natural: Provided that a vehicle inspection is not required, the vehicle is cleared.

(¬A35 → A36).natural: If security protocol is not activated by the security system, then the terminal is under normal operations.

(¬G → A1).natural: Under the condition that security clearance is not granted to a passenger, the passenger is allowed to board the flight.

(¬G → A32).natural: Provided that security clearance is not granted to a passenger, the terminal is under emergency lockdown.

(¬G → ¬A32).natural: If security clearance is not granted to a passenger, then it is not the case that the terminal is under emergency lockdown.

A30.natural: An alert is triggered by the security system.

A35.natural: Security protocol is activated by the security system.
